channel.title: Comments on: Upcoming webinars for Java and JPA access to MySQL Cluster
channel.description: Database technologies - especially around scalability and High Availability

item.title: By: admin
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Fabio Kaminski.

Hi Fabio, the recordings for the MySQL Cluster webinars get posted to http://www.mysql.com/products/database/cluster/resources.html

Regards, Andrew.

item.title: By: Fabio Kaminski
item.dc:creator: Fabio Kaminski
item.description:
can we see recorded past webinars? where are they?
Thanks!
item.content:encoded:
can we see recorded past webinars? where are they?

Thanks!

item.title: By: ChrisC
item.dc:creator: ChrisC
item.description: My mistake - just found the first webinar on the MySQL site. Its great to find someone else doing similar work to what I'm doing. Look forward to the next webinar.
item.content:encoded: My mistake – just found the first webinar on the MySQL site. Its great to find someone else doing similar work to what I’m doing. Look forward to the next webinar.

item.title: By: ChrisC
item.dc:creator: ChrisC
item.description:
I'm doing Java JPA development against MySQL cluster and will be attending the 2nd webinar. I've missed the first webinar - is there a recording of it that I can review before the presentation of the next part?
Many thanks Chris
item.content:encoded:
I’m doing Java JPA development against MySQL cluster and will be attending the 2nd webinar. I’ve missed the first webinar – is there a recording of it that I can review before the presentation of the next part?

Many thanks
Chris
